analysis.description: PoolOwners.isContract (/unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#387-389) is declared view but contains assembly code

PoolOwners.batchClaim (/unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#450-468) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- claimed == ownerMap.size()

PoolOwners.contribute.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#251) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#7-10)

PoolOwners.setOwnerShare.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#293) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#7-10)

PoolOwners.claimTokens.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#472-473) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#7-10)

Reentrancy in PoolOwners.distributeTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#427-444):
	External calls:
	- currentBalance = ERC20(_token).balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#432-436)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- dToken (/unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#443)
	- distribution (/unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#441-443)

PoolOwners.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#387-389)
	- /unique_chucks/6/0x3ab2ab661311501f4b3c9b17d40e3d95f9bc577f.sol#388-389
